title: Two men, and woman wearing eyeglasses, light colored shirt, and jacket with dark lapels, seated at typewriter, in office with desk and two chairs in center of room, large machine against wall that reads "Mailers", telephone on desk, North Carolina Mutural Life Insurance Company calendar on light colored wall, map of Europe, and signs on door that read "Tuesday A.M. is Deadline for Bulk of Pictures", "Get it first, but first get it right, and write it right!", and "Examples of Brevity"
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
